channel.title: CVE Feed for Notification – Custom Notifications and Alerts for WordPress -- Notification – Custom Notifications and Alerts for WordPress
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Notification – Custom Notifications and Alerts for WordPress -- Notification – Custom Notifications and Alerts for WordPress

item.title: CVE-2021-39340|2024-08-04T02:06:42.130Z -- notification%20%E2%80%93%20custom%20notifications%20and%20alerts%20for%20wordpress -- notification%20%E2%80%93%20custom%20notifications%20and%20alerts%20for%20wordpress
item.description: The Notification WordPress plugin is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting due to insufficient input validation and sanitization via several parameters found in the ~/src/classes/Utils/Settings.php file which made it possible for attackers with administrative user access to inject arbitrary web scripts, in versions up to and including 7.2.4. This affects multi-site installations where unfiltered_html is disabled for administrators, and sites where unfiltered_html is disabled.
